column4: when I create symlinks on my internal HDD that link to a location on an external HDD, and then unmount that external HDD. will the symlinks be deleted? what will happen if I try to access them? And will they be valid again, if I remount?
the symlink will still be their, but won't work.  once the device is remounted (as long as it's mounted to the same location) it should once again work
